Package paintingcanvas.drawable

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • paintingcanvas.drawable.Drawable<Image>
      • paintingcanvas.drawable.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animatable
    public class Image
extends Drawable<Image>

    Draws an image from the specified path.

    setColor and getColor don't do anything for this drawable as it is not a traditional solid color shape 

    
 // get the working directory of the program / where it is looking for your image
 System.out.println(System.getProperty("user.dir"));
 // create a new image object
 Image img = new Image(100, 100, "path/to/image.png");

    • Method Detail

      • setScale

        public Image setScale​(double x,
                      double y)
        Set the scale of the image to the specified multiplier. 
        
 Image img = new Image(0, 0, "image.png");
 img.setScale(2.0, 1.0); // the image is now stretched in the x direction
        Parameters:
        x - The multiplier to scale x by
        y - The multiplier to scale y by
        Returns:
        The original object to allow method chaining
